pullrequest.title: Bugfix for plots not showing without restart

content.raw: Issue #25 really sounds like it's this bug, so I'm optimistic. The occurrence of an error the first time the routine ran meant that the routine never got up to the `plot()` calls on its first run, so it's the same as 'routine had no plots the first time, but it did later', which is what I'm seeing even though errors are not involved.
content.html: Issue #25 really sounds like it's this bug, so I'm optimistic. The occurrence of an error the first time the routine ran meant that the routine never got up to the plot() calls on its first run, so it's the same as 'routine had no plots the first time, but it did later', which is what I'm seeing even though errors are not involved.
